titleStmt.title: Eighteene queries, extreame needfull to be debated and resolved of, before the city cannon be discharged against the Armie. With His Majesties propositions sent to the House of Parliament. Wherein is laid downe the manner of the Kings proceedings, since the beginning of this unnaturall warr, to this present moneth of August. 1647.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
